title: I got leave buster because my game keeps crashing and I couldn't do anything about it
body: I couldn't rejoin the game and I have no idea why. Whenever I click rejoin it says bug splat now I have leave buster for 5 games I think this is really unfair.

replies.body:
It's not possible to receive a 5-game penalty for a single disconnection, as it takes *a trend of disconnections* before you see such a penalty. Additionally, all disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, which is why all disconnections are treated equally by the system and why we cannot remove or modify penalties for any reason.

Bugsplats are often caused by certain driver or hardware issues, so I urge you to work through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions. Please let me know if those steps caused any change.
